opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ISTRA, VOŠTENI, 180 m2, 5-sobna Prodaje se prekrasna kuća s bazenom u Istri površine 180 m2 te okućnice 537 m2. Kuća se nalazi u naselju Vošteni. Kuća je katnica (prizemlje i prvi kat). Sastoji se od: PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, odvojeni wc, ostava te natkrivena terasa KAT: četiri spavaće sobe, četiri kupaonice, terasa. Iz kuhinje se izlazi na natkrivenu terasu s ljetnom kuhinjom i kaminom, a oko bazena površine 8x4m se nalaze masline i mediteransko bilje koje ima svoje navodnjavanje. Kuća je izgrađena 2016. godine . Svaka soba je klimatizirana te opremljena televizijom. Kuća posjeduje 2 natkrivena te 2 nenatkrivena parkirna mjesta. Kuća zbog svog koncepta i sjajne lokacije idealna je za investiciju. Kuća se prodaje kompletno namještena. Vlasništvo uredno. Kuća posjeduje Uporabnu dozvolu, mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. HOUSE, FOR SALE, ISTRIA, VOŠTENI, 180 m², 5-ROOM Beautiful house with a pool for sale in Istria, with a living area of 180 m² and a 537 m² yard. The house is located in the village of Vošteni. It’s a two-story house (ground floor and first floor). The layout is as follows: GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining area, separate toilet, storage room, and a covered terrace FIRST FLOOR: four bedrooms, four bathrooms, terrace From the kitchen, there's access to a covered terrace with a summer kitchen and fireplace. Around the 8x4m pool, there are olive trees and Mediterranean plants with their own irrigation system. The house was built in 2016. Every room is air-conditioned and equipped with a TV. There are 2 covered and 2 uncovered parking spaces. Thanks to its design and excellent location, the house is ideal as an investment. The house is being sold fully furnished. Ownership is clean. The house has a usage permit and can be purchased via mortgage. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 463 Vlaho Veneti Agent s licencom Mob: 098 166 9011 E-mail: vlaho@kavalir.hr www.kavalir.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
